code: import React from'react';import{useMaintenance}from'../context/MaintenanceContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MaintenanceRepair=()=>{const{requests,updateStatus}=useMaintenance();const pendingCount=requests.filter(request=>request.status==='Pending').length;const inProgressCount=requests.filter(request=>request.status==='In Progress').length;const completedCount=requests.filter(request=>request.status==='Completed').length;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Maintenance and Repair Management"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Handles daily maintenance and repair requests for the property, tracks the progress of issue resolution."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Issue"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Status"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Actions"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:requests.map(request=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:request.issue}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:request.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:request.status}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:request.status==='Completed'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{disabled:true,children:"Completed"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>updateStatus(request.id,'In Progress'),children:"Start"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>updateStatus(request.id,'Completed'),children:"Complete"})]})})]},request.id))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Pending Requests: ",pendingCount]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["In Progress Requests: ",inProgressCount]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Completed Requests: ",completedCount]})]})]});};export default MaintenanceRepair;
